<font color="#FF0000"> This will return the number of Replys of members to their original number of Replys </font> in the database. Do not run this if you have deleted the Replys or you change (increase) the number of Replys manually or imported from another forum package if you want to keep the number of Replys of the present members. Is likely that your users will decrease the number of Replys If you run this so only do this if you are confident that you really need! Turn on or off the Mentions

This option allows you to ban a specific group from using the mention. If there is more than one group, separate them with a comma ,
To disable this feature, leave it blank or put a zero 0

This option allows you to prevent a specific member from using the mention. In the event that there is more than one membership, separate the membership numbers with a comma ,
To disable this option, leave it blank or add a number 0

This option allows you to ban a specific forum from using the post. In the event that there is more than one forum, separate the forum numbers with a comma ,
